Bluebell Therapy

Contact & Prices

Counselling

  • £50 per 1:1 counselling session

    • This can be taken either face to face or online.

    On-line counselling will be facilitated by Zoom. This platform is GDPR compliant and has end-to-end encryption. As such, it is completely secure and confidential and is considered to be the most appropriate platform for therapeutic purposes. I may also be able to offer counselling via other platforms if this is not suitable for you (for example, email or instant messaging) – please ask.

  • Telephone or email counselling is also available - please enquire

Clinical Supervision for Professionals and Counselling Students:

  • £50 per hour (£75 per 1.5 hours, which is the usual requirement for NCS/BACP)
  • Student concession: £45/1.5 hours

Hypnotherapy:

  • £60 per 1:1 hypnotherapy session
  • Stop smoking therapy: £200 (this includes a Stop Smoking session, plus a complementary follow-up session)
  • Hypnosis for childbirth packages available - please enquire

Contact Me

If you would like a chat about how therapy can help you:

Call 07592706433 or email bluebelltherapy@gmail.com
